entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AND SPRINKLES IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
